flawed_nl_solution:
Mary has 3 + 1 + 1 = <<3+1+1=10>>10 rooms in her house.
At 4 minutes a room, it will take her 4 * 10 = <<4*10=40>>40 minutes to vacuum her whole house.
At 10 minutes a charge, she will need to charge her vacuum cleaner 40 / 10 = <<40/10=4>>4 times to vacuum her whole house.
#### 4

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 5, not 10. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
